law.catch_line: Public assistance claimant may have counsel -- Fees.
law.text: Any individual claiming public assistance in any proceeding before the appeal board or a court may be represented by counsel; but no counsel shall either charge or receive for such service more than an amount established by the secretary by administrative regulation.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(21). -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 3.
